alert.note: Alert for Dubuque; Jackson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 6:54PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jo Daviess, north central Jackson and southeastern Dubuque Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 654 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near La Motte, or 11 miles south of Dubuque, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bellevue, La Motte, Springbrook, St. Donatus, Rice, Spruce Creek Park, Blanding Landing, Smiths, Blanding, Aiken, Cottonville, Bellevue State Park and Massey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
